channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden set to designate 2 new giant national monuments in California, protecting 850,000 acres as Trump looks to expand drilling
item.description: Tuesday's move will mean Biden has conserved more lands and waters than any other U.S. president, the White House said.

item.title: Why Musk waded into U.K. child grooming gangs scandal
item.description: In a series of inflammatory tweets posted on his social media site X, the tech billionaire criticized PM Keir Starmer’s handling of so-called child gr...

item.title: 10 stocks making best use of investors’ money. Here’s who beats Nvidia.
Carvana gets its first upgrade since Hindenburg short-selling report
This stock is entering ‘beast mode’ this year, says analyst
Why Micron may be the winner from Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang’s CES keynote
How recruitment will change in 2025, according to top HR leaders from Hilton, PwC, and Ally Financial
item.description: Management will lean on AI and prioritize skills-based hiring to woo top talent.

item.title: The golden Christmas period was a huge boost for the U.K.’s biggest supermarkets Tesco and Sainsbury’s. But 2025’s storm clouds are brewing
item.description: The boom in spending was driven by average U.K. households making 17 shopping visits in December, according to Kantar data.

item.title: Value gap between U.S., European stocks never been more extreme: Deutsche Bank
Biden administration says its ban on unpaid medical bills from appearing on credit reports could lead to 22,000 more mortgages each year
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris said in a statement announcing the rule that it would be “lifechanging” for millions of families.
